original_title: The Future of Fashion with Alexa Chung in New York
overview: Watch Alexa Chungâ€™s second Vogue documentary in all its glory, as she travels around her adopted fashion capital of New York City. She visits PR guru Brian Phillips, retail darlings Humberto Leon and Carol Lim of Opening Ceremony, comedic fashion blogger Leandra Medine of Man Repeller and many more, to find out just how to succeed as a fashion business.
tagline: Alexa Chung will be talking to everyone from current fashion students to the heads of major design houses, via journalists, buyers and all the workers in between.
title: The Future of Fashion with Alexa Chung in New York
